dcterms:creator: T. N. Kipf
E. Fetaya
K. Wang
M. Welling
R. S. Zemel
dcterms:description: A dataset of interacting charged particles that interact via electrostatic Coulomb forces, extended by adding immovable sources that exert forces on observable particles.
dcterms:title: Electrostatic Field Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Bock
R. Krajewski
T. Moers
S. Runde
L. Vater
L. Eckstein
dcterms:description: A dataset containing real-world traffic scenes with trajectories of pedestrians, vehicles, and cyclists, focusing on static field discovery in traffic scenes.
dcterms:title: inD Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Brandstetter
R. Hesselink
E. van der Pol
E. Bekkers
M. Welling
dcterms:description: A dataset of gravitational n-body problems, extended by adding gravitational sources, used to study dynamic fields.
dcterms:title: Gravitational N-body Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Brandstetter
R. Hesselink
E. van der Pol
E. Bekkers
M. Welling
dcterms:description: An extension of the gravitational n-body dataset, focusing on a 2D setting with similar dynamics.
dcterms:title: 2D Gravitational N-body Dataset
